explains: n. <正式>（行为，道德）正当，得体；<正式>行为规范，礼节（proprieties）
wordGroup: with propriety 按照礼节；正当，适当

sentences.en: Nobody questioned the propriety of her being there alone.
sentences.cn: 没人认为她只身出现在那里不得体。

sentences.en: China has always been known as a land of propriety and righteousness.
sentences.cn: 中国从来以礼义之邦著称。

sentences.en: Their sense of social propriety is eroded.
sentences.cn: 他们的社交礼仪意识淡薄了。
